mention.text: a report saying racism in Chicago
blacks who alleged the victims of police brutality were the victims of police brutality

officers _ most of blacks white _ of unprovoked beatings , false arrests , intimidation and insulting blacks with racial slurs Among blacks was a 55-year-old grandmother , Callie Bryant , who testified that she and her daughter were beaten up in 1987 by seven white police officers who gave her '' the sign of the Ku Klux Klan
